data.actual_result: The red bar stays and Discord keeps using lots of battery.  Even bringing the app back to the foreground doesn't stop it, you'll need to restart the app.
data.expected_result: The iOS app turns off voice call mode, stopping the large title bar and extra battery usage associated with it.
data.short_description: Auto disconnect doesn't disable voice call mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Connect to a voice chat using the iOS app - Background the iOS app so you see the red bar across the top indicating that the app is in a call - On another device, connect to a voice chat so the iOS app automatically disconnects from its voice chat
